price: 4. Ese es el favor de Al-lah que concede a quien desea. Y Al-lah es dueño del favor inmenso.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhālika faḍlu al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
